title: Security
lede: Configure security settings, authentication methods, and access controls for your account.

sections.title: Authentication Settings
sections.content:
Configure authentication methods and password policies for your organization.

Authentication Options:

  • Two-Factor Authentication: Enable 2FA for enhanced security
  • Single Sign-On (SSO): Integrate with SAML/OAuth providers
  • Password Policies: Set password complexity requirements
  • Session Management: Control session timeouts and limits

sections.title: Access Control
sections.content:
Manage access controls and security policies.

  • IP Restrictions: Whitelist specific IP addresses or ranges
  • API Security: Manage API key permissions and rotation
  • Audit Logs: Track all user actions and security events
  • Data Encryption: Configure data encryption settings
